- Update input and output of scaling config in doc

title: Avoid frequently invoking native method Class.getCanonicalName
body:
JMH
```java
import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.context.refresher.MetaDataRefreshEngine;
import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.sql.dialect.statement.postgresql.dml.PostgreSQLSelectStatement;
import org.openjdk.jmh.Main;
import org.openjdk.jmh.annotations.Benchmark;
import org.openjdk.jmh.annotations.Fork;
import org.openjdk.jmh.annotations.Measurement;
import org.openjdk.jmh.annotations.Warmup;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.Collections;

@Fork(1)
@Warmup(iterations = 3, time = 5)
@Measurement(iterations = 3, time = 5)
public class MetaDataRefreshEngineBenchmark {
    
    @Benchmark
    public void benchMetaDataRefreshEngine() throws SQLException {
        new MetaDataRefreshEngine(null, null, null, null).refresh(new PostgreSQLSelectStatement(), Collections.emptyList());
    }
    
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        Main.main(new String[]{MetaDataRefreshEngineBenchmark.class.getName()});
    }
}
```



Before

title: Merge DistributionChannel and MemoryChannel to prepare for data pipeline Channel typed SPI
body:
Fixes #13875 part 24.

Currently, `MemoryChannel` is used for `InventoryTask` and `DistributionChannel` is used for `IncrementalTask`, in the latest configuration plan, channel could be typed SPI, so we need to merge `MemoryChannel` and `DistributionChannel` as `MEMORY` type, and it's possible to add other implementation, such as `KAFKA`.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Remove `MemoryChannel` and rename `DistributionChannel` to `MemoryChannel`. Prepare for `Channel` SPI.
- Improve `MemoryChannel` and make it compatible with inventory task and incremental task

title: ShardingSphere-Proxy MySQL with Vert.x backend
body:
Related to #13957.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- [x] Implements Vert.x executor and callback in `shardingsphere-infra-executor` and `shardingsphere-proxy-backend`

Structure of `shardingsphere-infra-executor`:
```
org
 apache
     shardingsphere
         infra
             executor
                 sql
                     execute
                      engine
                       driver
                           jdbc
                            JDBCExecutionUnit.java
                            JDBCExecutorCallback.java
                            JDBCExecutor.java
                            sane
                                JDBCSaneQueryResultEngineFactory.java
                           vertx
                               VertxExecutionUnit.java
                               VertxExecutorCallback.java
                               VertxExecutor.java
                      result
                          query
                              impl
                                  driver
                                      jdbc
                                       metadata
                                        JDBCQueryResultMetaData.java
                                       type
                                           memory
                                            JDBCMemoryQueryResult.java
                                            JDBCRowsLoader.java
                                           stream
                                               JDBCStreamQueryResult.java
                                      vertx
                                          VertxMySQLQueryResultMetaData.java
                                          VertxQueryResult.java
                     prepare
                         driver
                             jdbc
                              builder
                               JDBCExecutionUnitBuilder.java
                              JDBCDriverType.java
                             vertx
                                 builder
                                  PreparedQueryExecutionUnitBuilder.java
                                  VertxExecutionUnitBuilder.java
                                 VertxExecutionContext.java
```

Structure of `shardingsphere-proxy-backend`:
```
org
 apache
     shardingsphere
         proxy
             backend
                 communication
                  jdbc
                   connection
                    JDBCBackendConnection.java
                   datasource
                    JDBCBackendDataSource.java
                   JDBCDatabaseCommunicationEngine.java
                   transaction
                       JDBCBackendTransactionManager.java
                       LocalTransactionManager.java
                  ProxySQLExecutor.java
                  ReactiveProxySQLExecutor.java
                  TransactionManager.java
                  vertx
                      executor
                       ProxyReactiveExecutor.java
                      transaction
                       VertxLocalTransactionManager.java
                      VertxBackendConnection.java
                      VertxBackendDataSource.java
                      VertxDatabaseCommunicationEngine.java
                 reactive
                     context
                         ReactiveProxyContext.java
```

- [x] Add new frontend modules for reactive in Proxy
```
shardingsphere-proxy
 shardingsphere-proxy-backend (JDBC and Vert.x are both in the proxy-backend)
 shardingsphere-proxy-bootstrap
 shardingsphere-proxy-frontend
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-core
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-mysql
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-opengauss
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-postgresql
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-spi
New modules:
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-reactive-spi
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-reactive-core
    shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-reactive-mysql
```

Structure of `shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-reactive-spi`:
```
org
 apache
     shardingsphere
         proxy
             frontend
                 reactive
                     command
                      executor
                       ReactiveCommandExecutor.java
                      ReactiveCommandExecuteEngine.java
                     spi
                         ReactiveDatabaseProtocolFrontendEngine.java
```

Structure of `shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-reactive-core`:
```
org
 apache
     shardingsphere
         proxy
             frontend
                 reactive
                     command
                      ReactiveCommandExecuteTask.java
                     protocol
                      ReactiveDatabaseProtocolFrontendEngineFactory.java
                     state
                      impl
                          ReactiveOKProxyState.java
                     wrap
                         WrappedReactiveCommandExecutor.java
```

Structure of `shardingsphere-proxy-frontend-reactive-mysql`:
```
org
 apache
     shardingsphere
         proxy
             frontend
                 reactive
                     mysql
                         command
                             query
                              binary
                               execute
                                   ReactiveMySQLComStmtExecuteExecutor.java
                              text
                                  fieldlist
                                   ReactiveMySQLComFieldListPacketExecutor.java
                                  query
                                      ReactiveMySQLComQueryPacketExecutor.java
                             ReactiveMySQLCommandExecutorFactory.java
                             ReactiveMySQLFrontendEngine.java
```

- [x] Supports LOCAL transaction in reactive Proxy

title: [DistSQL] Add syntax `CREATE SHARDING SCALING` & `DROP SHARDING SCALING`
body:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
- new syntax: CREATE SHARDING SCALING, to create a new empty sharding scaling configuration
- new syntax: DROP SHARDING SCALING, to drop sharding scaling configuration
- add parse test cases
- add update test cases

### example:
```sql
CREATE SHARDING SCALING scalingName;
DROP SHARDING SCALING scalingName;
```

title: Improve data nodes visitor for sharding table rule.
body:
####  1. Improve data nodes visitor for sharding table rule.

Now, `DATANODES("ds_${[256181,256182]}.t_order")` will be parsed to `DATANODES("ds_${256181,256182}.t_order")`,  the BRACKETS  `[]` were lost.
It will cause InlineExpressionParser exception.

#### 2.  Add reserved characters when get identifier value.
Add a new method to specify which characters want to reserved when get Identifier value.
